ygData.subject: EQ Magazine Pics Needed
ygData.msgSnippet: When not wandering Norrath I race 1/10th scale radio controlled cars. In case you are not familiar with them, these are not the ones you buy at Radio Shack.
ygData.messageBody:
When not wandering Norrath I race 1/10th scale radio controlled cars. In
case you are not familiar with them, these are not the ones you buy at Radio
Shack. They are specifically designed for racing and my radio alone cost
more then the most expensive car at Radio Shack. If you are familiar, I run
in the Stock Truck class with an Associated T3.

The bodies of the vehicles are made of clear Lexan and are painted on the
inside to keep the paint from coming off during collisions. There is a glue
available that will let you glue pictures from magazines to the inside of
your vehicle before you paint it. The paper you use in your printer is to
thick and tends to peel off, it needs to be the thinner paper used in
magazines.

I want to make an EQ body for the on-road car I will be getting soon.
Imagine if Sony sponsored a NASCAR car for EverQuest. If anybody has any
computer or video game magazines with EQ related ads or other color pictures
I would very much like to get some. They can be for EQ, EQII, EQ Adventures,
Champions of Norrath or any of the EQ games. I will cut out the pics I need
so most anything has potential. I will take pages ripped out or entire
magazines. I will pay shipping and reimburse for the magazine. They will
need to be kept FLAT, if they have creases they will not be any good for my
purposes. I am located in the US if that helps.

I have the maps that came with EQ Evolution and may use some of them. The
manual is B&W so not much use.

If I get enough pictures to do up the body I will gladly post pics of it
when done.

"I brake for loot!"
